name: Travel da nang by night as local student
description:
It is known as the beautiful beach city, Da Nang become more and more famous with big bridges, modern developing city and beautiful and long beach. In addition, there are a lot of famous landscapes such as Linh Ung pagado, Marble mountain, etc. and tradition individual foods.  You can enjoy them in any tour of traveling company, now my tour give you strange and interesting experiences in Da Nang by night. Do you want what student of Viet Nam university do in evening? Come to me if  your question was “yes”.
Evening is time when young people go out and meet friends.  We can come to coffe to chat and listen to music. Maybe we go to popular restaurant to eat nosh.
